mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sitterInfo(sittingId, title, content, startDate, endDate, reserDiv, reserCost, addPet, addPetCost, carableWeight, carableAge, tag, space, subway, yard, baby, family, other) VALUES (sitterInfo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reserDiv}, #{reserCost}, #{addPet}, #{addPetCost}, #{carableWeight}, #{carableAge}, #{tag}, #{space}, #{subway}, #{yard}, #{baby}, #{family}, #{other})
